GnrcVstKeyPerformanceInd.name: GnrcVstKeyPerformanceInd
GnrcVstKeyPerformanceInd.description: Represents the key performance indicators that can be recorded while performing a task during a visit. You can compare the expected and actual metric values with the key performance indicator records.

ActualBooleanValue.description: The actual boolean value recorded by the visitor for a key performance indicator.

ActualDateTimeValue.description: The actual date and time value recorded by the visitor for a key performance indicator.

ActualDecimalValue.description: The actual decimal value recorded by the visitor for a key performance indicator.

ActualIntegerValue.description: The actual integer value recorded by the visitor for a key performance indicator.

ActualStringValue.description: The actual string value recorded by the visitor for a key performance indicator.

AssessmentIndDefinitionId.description: The assessment indicator definition associated with the record.

DefinitionReferenceId.description: The definition record associated with the runtime record. The value is null when the definition record is created.

ExpectedBooleanValue.description: The expected boolean value defined by a manager for a key performance indicator.

ExpectedDateTimeValue.description: The expected date and time value defined by a manager for a key performance indicator.

ExpectedDecimalValue.description: The expected decimal value defined by a manager for a key performance indicator.

ExpectedIntegerValue.description: The expected integer value defined by a manager for a key performance indicator.

ExpectedStringValue.description: The expected string value defined by a manager for a key performance indicator.

IsDefinition.description: Indicates whether the record is a definition (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: Autogenerated unique identifier for the key performance indicator record.

SequenceNumber.description: The sequence in which the key performance indicator can be recorded.

UnitOfMeasure.description: The unit of measure associated with the key performance indicator.

VisitTaskContextId.description: The visit task context associated with the record.
